content: अपद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Footless. {@--2@} Having no office or post. --दः A reptile. --दं {@--1@} No place or abode. {@--2@} A wrong or bad place or abode; wrong timer चिरमपदे शंकितोऽस्मि <ls>M. 1</ls> my doubts were out of place, ill-founded; ग्रेम पश्यति भयान्यपदोपि <ls>Ki. 9. 70</ls> unreasonably. {@--3@} A word which is not a {%pada%} or an inflected word. {@--4@} Ether.
